Some of the background details of this story are based, very, very loosely, on real events of the era in which this was placed. The story combines the hatred that was felt towards Roma and the fear that was felt towards homosexuals. Instead of putting the Roma in gas chambers, they only attacked them (as the Germans would attack gays sometime later), and instead of being motivated by hate, they were motivated by hate and power. Leland follows the story of Leland P. Fitzgerald (Ryan Gosling), a disaffected teenager who has apparently murdered a severely retarded peer, the brother of Patrick Danes (Hugo Hands), another one of the series’s antagonists. Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: the beginning of Miyazawa’s life at the beginning of the Showa period and the ending at the beginning of World War II.
